citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on28-Mar-18 at 11:00AM.
The laboratory manager was contacted by phone and would be unavailable for an inspection until next week.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on28-Mar-18 at 11:00AM.
The laboratory manager was contacted by phone and would be unavailable for an inspection until next week.
